name: Stronghold Clicker
description:
So this is my first game, It's a android game made in Unity available on Google Play :) If you have any problems or suggestions, please leave them in the comments below. 

I hope you'll give it a chance and try it out :)

Game description:

Become the king 🤴 or queen 👸 of your own kingdom. 

Rebuild an abandoned fortress and expand your kingdom's economy by buying upgrades with coins and prestige points. Take part in mini-games in the events tab to get a special currency - emeralds, which will further accelerate its development. 🏰

Features of Stronghold Clicker:

👑 Casual and easy gameplay

👑 Earn coins even when the game is closed

👑 Take part in the weekend event

👑 Grow your kingdom, and when you reach the desired level of development, do "prestige" which will reset your upgrades, but reward you with gems that will speed up your re-development!
